title: 820-00850-a
message:
Hi.

I have this laptop which the client said the screen was showing purple lines on screen when on 45' angle but since he got it here the laptop didn't show picture at all only backlight. I measured j8500 and on pin 6 with diode mode the value seems high 1.600 so i followed the line to R0557 which should be 100k but when measured on the board it's 47k. I removed it and it's 100k when not soldered and the value on board stays the same. R4830 it's measuring fine. Any ideas please? 

Thanks :D

title: 820-00850-a
message: Flexgate

title: 820-00850-a
message:
Check if Apple can still change the screen for free.

Onboard mesurements for high value resistors, almost never show the nominal value; is normal, depending by other components.

title: 820-00850-a
message:
Ok thanks looks like an lcd issue. If i replace the full flex should be fine i think. I'll advise the client :)

Good day  :D

title: 820-00850-a
message: Hey guys. Not an lcd issue i got a new one and power on no image, would appreciate some assistance :)

title: 820-00850-a
message: Did you check full LCD assembly?

title: 820-00850-a
message: Yes full lcd assembly i got brand new

title: 820-00850-a
message: I'm measuring now and on the backlight circuit on Q8400 i have voltage on PPVIN_S0SW_LCDBKLT_R and on contacts 1,2,5,6 nothing. I'll keep measuring the components and update... There no Image if anyone wanna ask :)

title: 820-00850-a
message: Nothing wrong with backlight circuit components seems like Q8400 it's not opening

title: 820-00850-a
message:
If no image present, no reason to search for backlight.
Backlight appears after image get stable, to avoid any artifacts on the screen.

Check first if you get external video, or at least USB activity.

title: 820-00850-a
message: Yes there is External video working fine

title: 820-00850-a
message:
"Brand new" chinese?
Check again with original assembly.
If backlight comes on, there must be a problem with internal eDP data lines; if no image.

title: 820-00850-a
message: Brand new original and with the old that we had the last time it showed anything was lines ...

title: 820-00850-a
message: Check again with old one, to confirm you still get lines at least...

title: 820-00850-a
message: I checked already not showing image and no backlight and on external runs perfect

title: 820-00850-a
message:
If you don't get the lines like before, seems that LCD is not detected now.
Check if 3V3/5V_S0SW_LCD are present at J8500 at least; DP_INT_HPD should go high too.

title: 820-00850-a
message: Thanks i'll check and update... Appreciate it

title: 820-00850-a
message:
PP3V3_S0SW_LCD 3.4v
PP5V_S0SW_LCD   5.15v
DP_INT_HPD not going anywhere :D 0v with plugged screen

title: 820-00850-a
message:
Then the screen is not detected.
Test with known good working screen assembly.

title: 820-00850-a
message: I don't have another screen and the supplier has never sent a bad screen. Any other ideas?

title: 820-00850-a
message: Bad video cable, connector, or PCH...

title: 820-00850-a
message: i tried another 2 cables and the connector is without any damage on the board. I'l re check what lines are going to cpu/pch

title: 820-00850-a
message: On J8500 pin 6 DP_INT_HPD diode value is 1.5 and i took another board which is 820-00239-a and it's 0.45 on the same pin same network and goes directly to cpu...

title: 820-00850-a
message:
Both readings with red probe at ground?
If yes, there is a problem; possibly bad CPU, or solders.

title: 820-00850-a
message: Yes red probe on ground as it should be for diode mode reading. I check all resistors also replaced R4830 cause on pin 1 which comes from pin 2 of q4830 it has 1.647 diode mode value and on pin 2 of R4830 it has 0.568. I also replaced q4830 but no change. All leads to a contact under the CPU which probably broke cause of overheating

title: 820-00850-a
message: The issue comes probably from under cpu or bad cpu. The client will use it on external for now. Thanks for the help
